desc: Shop home bin bags, garden refuse sacks, kitchen bin liners and bin bags for office. Eco frindly refuse sacks made with tough recycled material making all BIN IT bags durable and high quality. Available with free shipping on all bulk offers and orders over £20 of the official BIN IT bags store.

layout.text: 100% Recycled Durable Bin Bags, made in Britain!
We produce durable bin bags for the considerate shopper, that are British made & 100% recycled because we take responsibility for what we make.
